library(reasonbench)
set.seed(123)

df <- tibble::tibble(
  target = rpois(2000, lambda = runif(2000, 0.3, 2.5)),
  pred   = runif(2000, 0.3, 2.5)
)

evaluate_model(df, "target", "pred", dist = "poisson", n_sim = 20)
